data.title: Joe McStravick Director
data.text:
I have directed and produced a range of documentary films for BBC, BBC NI and TG4. I have also also directed a number of documentary shorts which have screened at a number of international film festivals.

My latest film Questionable Treatment will premiere at the Docs Ireland Film Festival, in July 2022. The film will then embark on an international film festival run.

Below are link to some of my previous documentary films –

DOCUMENTARY CREDITS –

(2022) QUESTIONABLE TREATMENT

Director, Producer & DoP

Documentary Short

Production Company: Purple Finch Productions (Ltd)

Funded by: Northern Ireland Screen, BFI Network and LCCC Arts.

The development of this film was funded by Future Screens NI

(2019) THE NIGHT IS BLACK AND THE DAY IS WHITE

Director/Producer & DoP

Short Film, 9 mins

Production Company: Purple Finch Productions (Ltd)

Funded by: Northern Ireland Screen, BFI Network and LCCC Arts

(2019) THE SPECTRUM

Short Film, 12 mins

Production Company: Purple Finch Productions (Ltd). Commissioned by: South Eastern Health & Social Care Trust (Northern Ireland).

Short Film, 10 mins
